body: Why the fuck is Gil wearing stockings! Astolfo is the crossdresser not gil!
Another Ankoman banger. Short but sweet.
I wish for a normal doujin with miss crane
I really dont understand why he only draws the same shit ever and ever, what is the cost to change the formula? Your fans will like everything you do, draw something different dammit
A shame that we are probably never going to see something of crane that doesn't come from ankoman
the crowbar dick strikes again! but honestly the dick is hilarious

I kinda like the artist's art style, it's just that his plot is often repetitive and he only draws like 5, at most 12 pages. 

Real unfortunate cuz as I said, really like his art style

Astolfo's spam from this author is scary, not only does he deform a good character like Astolfo and turn him into a fucking fuckboy, but he also overexploits him to no end because he has run out of ideas, better than learn to draw better instead of recycling himself in every doujin
